tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Pillar Procedure,Dental Crowns,Post and Core,
review: *** ***** ** ** ********* ******** She was very supportive, and thorough when explaining the process. She is a professional and has a naturally lovely personality. I would recommend her to everyone. *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** Very thorough and caring. I'm terribly afraid of the dentist and she's very sensitive to that. She offered me the most Painless treatment and goes the extra mile to make you feel comfortable. She helped me overcome my dentophobia. Love her!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ***** ***** *** ************* *** forthcoming  about my dental condition and was great with her general advice after my cleaning session. Both Dr. Anand and Dr. Mansi Arora seem genuine and patient centric, they did not once try to sell unnecessary procedures despite my questions. I had a wonderful experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Jyoti Anand is a wonderful doctor. She has a very very clean hand on RCT, the root canal treatment. It was a painless procedure throughout. And the best part is that surprised me that RCT can happen in one sitting which I always thought was impossible but Dr Jyoti was so so patient with me to consider my tooth sensitivity and conplete the RCT in just one sitting.  She is an expert in her job and I highly highly recommend her. Thank you Dr. Jyoti. God bless you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Jyoti for my receding gums issue. The doctor explained the issue in a very detailed way, and suggested immediate solution. The staff was friendly and appropriate measures were taken to ensure COVID guidelines. My overall experience with the doctor was really good and I definitely recommend Dr. Jyoti.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I was having issues with my wisdom tooth and cavity in few other teeth. Dr Jyoti/Dr Mansi explained the situation and recommended me necessary action. 
She treated my problem with great empathy and gave her full time and attention.
Tooth removal without any issue and Clinical filling of teeth.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Jyoti was very thorough while explaining the problem and provided a satisfactory consult.
She scheduled an appointment for the next day for my wisdom teeth extraction by a visiting doctor.
The doctor was swift while removing the teeth.
The procedure went smooth. Follow up was thorough as well.

Prices are better than what i enquired at other clinics.
Overall....a good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The clinic is spacious neat & clean with cosy ambiance. Staff are organised and courteous knowledgeable about their functions.
Dr Jyoti & her senior colleague appear well qualified and competent. Their regular interactions on each case gives us more confidence & comfort.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Jyoti and Mansi patiently filled 3 tooth and 3 RCTs. They designed an entire plan for treating my brother. They kept us informed at every stage what needs to be done and what is completed. We couldn't complete the treatment because of time crunch. But they made sure that the maximum was covered. Extremely calm staff and friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ******** ** *** *** **** ******* *** ****** I approached her for my Root Canal Treatment.She’s very gentle and an exceptional Dentist at the same time.She explains every step of the treatment and makes sure her patients are comfortable.The procedure was painless and I’m very glad I visited her for my treatment as it went smoothly.I would recommend everyone to visit her for Dental treatments.She’s truly friendly and an amazing dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

review: This place will give you a feel of branded clinic with conspicuous service. Came here for scaling, which was effectively done by Dr. Jyoti Anand. She is a great practitioner and mostly calm. After the final sitting, I know I will surely have a healthy dental life.God bless her.
